## Version 1 - Chunk Fold with line numbers

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show the code"
#| code-line-numbers: true

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
penguins |>                                      # <1>
  mutate(                                        # <2>
    bill_ratio = bill_depth_mm / bill_length_mm, # <2>
    bill_area  = bill_depth_mm * bill_length_mm  # <2>
  ) 
```
